AddColumnRequest.description: Adds a new column to a board with task status mapping.

AddTagRequest.description: Adds a tag to a task with automatic normalization.

displayName.description: User's display name (redacted by default, e.g. "J***e").

isActive.description: Whether the user account is active (not locked out permanently).

createdAt.description: When the user account was created.

AdminUserDto.description: Read model for user data in admin views. Protected data fields are redacted by default.

properties.description: Optional key-value properties attached to the event.

AnalyticsEvent.description: A single analytics event from the frontend.

AssignRoleRequest.description: Assigns a role to a user account.

AuditAction.description: Categorizes security-relevant actions recorded in the audit trail.

AuditEntryDto.description: Data transfer object for an audit trail entry.

AuthResponse.description: Authentication response containing access token and user profile.

columns.description: Ordered list of columns on the board.

cards.description: Task cards positioned on the board, optionally filtered to exclude deleted/archived tasks.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the board was created.

BoardDto.description: Read model for a board, including its columns and active task cards.

BulkCompleteRequest.description: Completes multiple tasks in a single operation.

targetStatus.description: Task status that cards in this column represent (Todo, InProgress, or Done).

position.description: Zero-based position of the column on the board (left to right ordering).

maxTasks.description: Maximum number of tasks allowed in this column for WIP limits, or null for unlimited.

ColumnDto.description: Read model for a board column, including its target status mapping.

CreateTaskRequest.description: Creates a new task with optional metadata.

LoginRequest.description: Authenticates a user with email and password credentials.

MoveTaskRequest.description: Moves a task to a new position using neighbor-based ranking.

items.description: The notification items for this page.

isRead.description: Whether the user has read this notification.

readAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the notification was read, or null.

NotificationResponse.description: Single notification in a list response.

completed.description: Whether the user has completed onboarding.

completedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of completion, or null.

totalPages.description: Total number of pages available based on int PagedResult<T>.TotalCount and int PagedResult<T>.PageSize.

hasNextPage.description: True if there are more pages after the current int PagedResult<T>.Page.

hasPreviousPage.description: True if there are pages before the current int PagedResult<T>.Page. False when on the first page.

totalPages.description: Total number of pages available based on int PagedResult<T>.TotalCount and int PagedResult<T>.PageSize.

hasNextPage.description: True if there are more pages after the current int PagedResult<T>.Page.

hasPreviousPage.description: True if there are pages before the current int PagedResult<T>.Page. False when on the first page.

totalPages.description: Total number of pages available based on int PagedResult<T>.TotalCount and int PagedResult<T>.PageSize.

hasNextPage.description: True if there are more pages after the current int PagedResult<T>.Page.

hasPreviousPage.description: True if there are pages before the current int PagedResult<T>.Page. False when on the first page.

RegisterRequest.description: Registers a new user account with email and password.

ReorderColumnRequest.description: Reorders a column within the board's column list.

RevealedProfileResponse.description: Response containing the user's unredacted profile data after password re-authentication.

RevealedProtectedDataDto.description: DTO returned when protected data is revealed.

RevealProtectedDataRequest.description: Reveals a user's protected data via break-the-glass authentication.

RevealTaskNoteRequest.description: Reveals a task's sensitive note via break-the-glass authentication.

taskId.description: Unique identifier of the task this card represents.

columnId.description: Unique identifier of the column where this card is placed.

rank.description: Fractional rank for ordering cards within the column. Higher values appear later in the list.

TaskCardDto.description: Read model for a task's spatial placement on a board (column + rank).

title.description: Title or summary of the task.

description.description: Detailed description or notes for the task.

tags.description: Collection of tags for categorizing or labeling the task.

isArchived.description: Indicates if the task is archived (hidden from active views but not deleted).

isDeleted.description: Indicates if the task has been soft-deleted.

sensitiveNote.description: Whether this task has an encrypted sensitive note. Shows "[PROTECTED]" or null.

completedAt.description: Timestamp when the task was marked as Done, or null if not completed.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the task was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the task was last modified.

TaskDto.description: Read model for a task, flattening value objects to primitive types for API responses.

events.description: The list of analytics events to record.

TrackEventsRequest.description: Batch of analytics events sent from the frontend.

UpdateTaskRequest.description: Updates a task with partial field modifications.

UserResponse.description: User profile information with redacted personal data.

ViewTaskNoteRequest.description: Views a task's sensitive note via break-the-glass authentication.
